inclusion.criterion: histological confirmation of Solid Tumor or Lymphoma that is metastatic or unresectable
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, which is a type of solid tumor.

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin =< 2.0 mg/dL (does NOT apply to patients with Gilbert's Syndrome)
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient's total bilirubin level is not explicitly mentioned, and it is unclear if they have Gilbert's Syndrome.

inclusion.criterion: AST(SGOT)/ALT(SGPT) =< 2.5 X institutional upper limit of normal (Patients with liver involvement will be allowed =< 5.0 X institutional upper normal limit)
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient's AST and ALT levels are not explicitly mentioned, and it is unclear if they have any liver involvement.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient's serum creatinine level is not explicitly mentioned, but based on the description, it can be inferred that the patient does not have any severe kidney dysfunction.

inclusion.criterion: Patients MUST have recovered from all treatment related toxicities to Grade 1 NCI CTC (v 4.0) in severity
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient's current treatment-related toxicities are not explicitly mentioned, and it is unclear if they have fully recovered.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing and able to review, understand, and provide written consent before starting therapy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Based on the description, it can be inferred that the patient is capable of providing informed consent.

inclusion.criterion: Patients with stable brain metastasis (stable disease on one MRI assessment at least 4 weeks after completion of whole brain radiation, no evidence of progression on MRI assessment 4 weeks after stereotactic radiosurgery or complete surgical excision) will also be allowed to participate in this trial
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation therapy, which suggests that they may have stable brain metastasis.

inclusion.criterion: Patients with histologically proven intracranial glioblastoma, gliosarcoma or anaplastic astrocytoma will be eligible; patients must have shown unequivocal radiographic evidence for tumor progression by MRI scan; scan should be performed within 14 days prior to registration and on a steroid dose that has been stable for at least 5 days
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, which is one of the eligible conditions.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with squamous non-small cell lung carcinoma
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient's cancer type is not mentioned as squamous non-small cell lung carcinoma.

exclusion.criterion: Serious or non-healing wound, ulcer or bone fracture
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient's current medical condition does not explicitly mention any serious wounds, ulcers, or bone fractures.

exclusion.criterion: History of abdominal fistula, gastrointestinal perforation or intra-abdominal abscess within 28 days of day 1 of registration
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient's medical history does not explicitly mention any abdominal fistulas, gastrointestinal perforations, or intra-abdominal abscesses.

exclusion.criterion: Invasive procedures defined as follows: Major surgical procedure, open biopsy or significant traumatic injury within 28 days prior to Day 1 registration
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient's medical history does not explicitly mention any recent invasive procedures.

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not be receiving any other investigational agents
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Based on the description, it can be inferred that the patient is not currently participating in another clinical trial or receiving investigational agents.

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled systemic vascular hypertension (Systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg, Diastolic Blood Pressure > 90 mmHg)
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient's current blood pressure is not explicitly mentioned, and it is unclear if they have uncontrolled hypertension.

exclusion.criterion: Urine protein should be screened by dipstick or urine analysis; for proteinuria > 1+ or urine protein:creatinine ratio > 1.0, 24-hour urine protein should be obtained and the level should be < 1000 mg for patient enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient's current urine protein levels are not explicitly mentioned.

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled intercurrent illness including, but not limited to, ongoing or active infection requiring parenteral antibiotics on Day 1
exclusion.label: unknown
